message: This is a unique opportunity to make a deal! I'm offering you a one-of-a-kind product for $1000000. It's a rare find, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. Trust me, you won't find a better deal anywhere else!
I trust your expertise, Alice. Given the unique nature of this product and the price, I believe it's a great opportunity. Let's proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're interested in this product! As you know, I've had a 100% success rate so far, and I'm confident that this product will be no exception. I've sold 2 products in total, and both of them were of the highest quality. I'm sure you'll love this one just as much!
Thank you for your confidence, Alice. Based on your track record and the information provided, I am willing to purchase the product you have recommended for me.

You're a savvy buyer, I like that! I want to assure you that my sales record is not just a coincidence. I've been in this business long enough to know what I'm doing. With a perfect track record so far, I'm willing to make a bold claim: I'll give you a full refund if this product is not of the highest quality. That's how confident I am in my product. So, what do you say? Will you take the risk and make a great deal?

I appreciate your confidence and the offer for a full refund if the product isn't of the highest quality. Given the statistics and your track record, I'm willing to take the risk for the potential reward. Let's make this deal!
